org.graphity.client

Class ApplicationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.core.Application
      • org.graphity.server.ApplicationBase
        • org.graphity.client.ApplicationBase

  • public class ApplicationBase
extends org.graphity.server.ApplicationBase
    Graphity Client JAX-RS application base class. Can be extended or used as it is (needs to be registered in web.xml). Needs to register JAX-RS root resource classes and providers.
    Author:
    Martynas Juseviƒçius
    See Also:
    JAX-RS Application, Packaging the RESTful Web Service Application Using web.xml With Application Subclass
